about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: 3rike is is a driver-first platform built to help 3rike drivers own their bikes, save money, and access flexible loans.
about.paragraph2: It also opens opportunities for investors to fund drivers, earn attractive returns, and grow their savings through a secure, transparent financing system. Empowering drivers. Rewarding investors. Driving shared growth.
